about.title: About O.A.S.I.S. Medicals
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Healthcare Partner - Dedicated to providing exceptional diagnostic services
about.description: O.A.S.I.S. Medicals is a premier diagnostic center located in Odo-Ona Kekere, New Garage, Ibadan. We are committed to providing accurate, timely, and affordable diagnostic services to our community.
about.missionText: To deliver exceptional diagnostic services with compassion, accuracy, and integrity, making quality healthcare accessible to all while maintaining the highest professional standards.
about.visionText: To be the leading diagnostic center in Nigeria, providing world-class medical services that improve health outcomes and save lives through early detection and accurate diagnosis.

reasons.accurateDesc: State-of-the-art equipment ensuring precise results delivered when you need them most.
reasons.affordableDesc: Latest medical technology for superior imaging and diagnostic capabilities.
reasons.fastDesc: Your privacy and comfort are our priorities in every interaction and procedure.
reasons.professionalDesc: Our team of certified specialists brings years of expertise to every test and consultation.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.message: Please note: If you would like our team to collect samples from your home, office, or any other location, there will be an extra charge. Charges are determined by distance and will be discussed in person before confirmation.
